name: Cursor Free
summary_and_recommendation: Medium risk tool that can be used with standard enterprise controls. Privacy Mode provides strong data protection guarantees, but Free tier lacks enterprise management features. Recommend upgrading to Business/Enterprise plan for organizational use or implementing compensating controls.
assessment_notes: High confidence assessment based on comprehensive public documentation including detailed security page, privacy policies, and trust center. Limited by lack of private enterprise documentation for Free tier.

recommended_restrictions: Block installation on sensitive systems without approval

recommendations.title: Enable Privacy Mode
recommendations.description: Ensure Privacy Mode is enabled for all users to guarantee zero data retention and prevent training use

recommendations.title: Consider Business/Enterprise Upgrade
recommendations.description: For organizational deployment, upgrade to Business or Enterprise plan for admin controls, SSO, and audit capabilities

recommendations.title: Network Monitoring
recommendations.description: Monitor network traffic to Cursor domains to ensure compliance with privacy policies

recommendations.title: User Training
recommendations.description: Train users on Privacy Mode settings and data handling best practices

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Medium risk tool suitable for development work with proper controls. Privacy Mode provides strong data protection, but Free tier lacks enterprise management features essential for organizational deployment.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Infrastructure primarily hosted on AWS with servers in US, some latency-critical servers in Tokyo and London regions. Clear documentation of data residency.

encryption_standards.justification: Basic Encryption - TLS encryption in transit + standard encryption at rest + limited encryption details published - Security documentation mentions encryption practices but lacks detailed specifications of encryption standards and key management.

data_retention.justification: Extended Retention - Long retention periods documented (>90 days, â‰¤1 year) + deletion procedures available - Privacy Mode guarantees zero retention, but non-privacy mode has extended retention periods. Account deletion available with 30-day guarantee.

model_training.justification: Opt-out available with clear process - Privacy Mode provides contractual guarantee of no training use. When Privacy Mode is disabled, data may be used for model training, but opt-out is clearly available.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Zero data retention agreements with all AI model providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI). Clear documentation that third-party LLMs see but don't retain data when Privacy Mode is enabled.

admin_management.justification: No Admin Oversight - Individual accounts only + no organizational visibility + no centralized management - Free tier provides individual accounts with no enterprise admin controls or organizational visibility.

audit_capabilities.justification: No Audit Capabilities - No activity logs OR logs not accessible to administrators OR no usage tracking - Free tier lacks audit capabilities or usage tracking accessible to administrators.

integration.justification: No Enterprise Integration - Username/password only + no SSO + no enterprise identity management - Free tier lacks SSO and enterprise identity management features.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - SOC 2 Type II certified with annual penetration testing, but lacks some specialized compliance certifications.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Full Transparency - Published data flow diagrams + specific data processing locations + detailed retention schedules + clear third-party processor list - Comprehensive security documentation with detailed data flow, processing locations, and complete subprocessor list.

documentation_and_support.justification: Good Documentation - Clear privacy policy + basic security documentation + responsive support + annual transparency reports - Comprehensive public security documentation, clear privacy policies, trust center with SOC 2 certification, and commitment to transparency reporting.
